min-max normalization

Source: R/base.R
normalization.Rd

min-max normalization

normalization(x, z = 0.2)

Arguments

x

numeric vector

z

scalar add minimum value to avoid 0

Value

normalized vector

Examples

normalization(runif(100,min = -100, max = 100))
#>   [1] 0.2116170 0.5919588 0.8239779 0.8179683 1.1540303 0.6131095 1.1467338
